message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. This is a competitive price, considering the value it brings to your business.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on this product. However, $12,000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for it. This is a fair price considering my needs and the value you've described.

I understand that $10,500 is a bit of a stretch for you, Bob. However, I'm still confident that this product will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,750. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, and I believe it's still a fair reflection of the product's value.
